topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556e7543636872132e940300#post_556e7543636872132e940300
Personally I think it's a good move cause it will force companies to improve their quality standards.  The reason why steam went to shit quality wise is because companies knew they could roll out a crap game and run with the money; now if a game is shit they can just return it if they've played less than 2 hours and within 14 days.  My money is on this will cause a drastic increase in quality of game quality.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
